Subject: Building the Great Beast of Malvern""
Description: One of us needed a new computer. One of us kicked off the campaign to fund it. One of us assembled the massive system. One of us installed the software. We were never all in the same place at the same time. All of us blogged about it, and had a great time with the whole folderol. Come hear how Eric 'esr' Raymond got his monster machine, with 'a little help from his friends' scattered all over the Internet.  Speakers include:Eric Raymond, Wendell Wilson, John D. Bell - Track: Tech, DIY  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: Projector
